item.title: RE Store- A Second Life for Building Materials
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On__YLvM-aw Uploaded on Sep 26, 2006 Peak Moment #32: Tour a fascinating used building materials store with retail store manager Nate Moore and building deconstruction manager Erin Marden. It’s one of many projects discussed by Robyn duPre of RE Sources for Sustainable Communities (www.re-sources.org).
